description:
goprotobuf: Don't treat groups as messages.

They no longer get XXX_unrecognized fields, nor satisfy the proto.Message interface.

messages.text:
Hello nigeltao@golang.org, r (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

Hello nigeltao (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/goprotobuf

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/goprotobuf/source/detail?r=d2c1b0633ec3 ***

goprotobuf: Don't treat groups as messages.

They no longer get XXX_unrecognized fields, nor satisfy the proto.Message interface.

R=nigeltao, r
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/6829043

subject: code review 6829043: goprotobuf: Don't treat groups as messages.
